metadata.description: Andy's most recent levels by ticker - quick reference for pre-trade checks. Auto-expires after 7 days without update. UPDATED INTRADAY POST-FOMC.
metadata.usage: When analyzing potential trade, check this file for Andy's recent levels and bias on that ticker. If aligned with your thesis = +1 confluence (Rule #0).
metadata.session_note: CRITICAL: FOMC dovish + QT ending shifted market from reversion to rally. Morning bearish thesis broken. SPX/AAPL/GOOG rallying through resistance. Mega-cap led, mining strong.

SPX.current_status: BROKEN THROUGH 6885 - now 6922, 6937 are retest levels
SPX.key_pattern: FOMC rally broke through resistance. Dovish cut + QT ending = bullish catalyst.
SPX.notes: INTRADAY UPDATE: SPX rallied through morning resistance on dovish FOMC (25bps cut) + Fed QT ending announcement. Mega-cap led move. 6922 and 6937 now support/retest zones. Reversion thesis broken.

QQQ.notes: Hitting resistance but breadth negative underneath. Fed day volatility expected.

AAPL.current_status: THROUGH 269.87 resistance - day high next (Andy intraday call)
AAPL.key_pattern: Broke through morning 'distribution' level. NOT distribution - growth acceleration breakout.
AAPL.notes: INTRADAY UPDATE: AAPL rallied through 269.87 resistance on FOMC dovish. Andy morning distribution call WRONG on direction. Market rallying through mega-cap resistance, not reversing. Day high next per Andy.

NVDA.notes: Momentum loss vs AMD. Shows weakness despite ATH break. Mega-cap distribution signal.

AMD.key_pattern: More upside than NVDA. Pullback to support = buy
AMD.notes: Andy: 'AMD has more upside than NVDA at moment.' Targets: $271.75 first, then $299 after pullback. Wait for structure clarity at 225-230 support.

MSFT.notes: Key support level. Data center play. Fed day volatile.

GOOG.key_pattern: Mega-cap acceleration on FOMC dovish. Breaking through resistance levels.
GOOG.notes: INTRADAY UPDATE: GOOG strengthening post-FOMC. 275 next target per Andy. Data center narrative intact with lower rates.

TSLA.notes: Support/resistance clear. Waiting for directional break on Fed day volatility.

CLS.notes: Manufacturing AVGO products, large data center footprint. Andy scaled back in (accumulation). Earnings Oct 31.

CAT.notes: Andy: 'Earns were nutty good.' Targets 580-600. Two growth avenues: (1) Data center generators, (2) Mining equipment. BUT caution: 'Sell the news' risk on Fed day.

CCJ.notes: Cameco bought Westinghouse. Government 80B nuclear plant contract. CCJ produces 20% global nuclear fuel. Long-term bullish thesis.

CEG.notes: Long-term structural play. Near-term growth from fuel suppliers (CCJ, UEC). Traditional plant takes 7 years to build.

UEC.notes: Part of nuclear growth thesis. Fuel supply = near-term growth driver.

BWXT.notes: Part of nuclear growth thesis. Fuel supply = near-term growth driver.

RUN.notes: Entry documented. Clear target. Monitor for fill validation.

GDXJ.notes: Best in precious metals. Andy accumulating. Watch gap reaction for continuation signal.

APPX.notes: Entry documented. Clear targets. Risk defined.

APP.notes: Technical wave count. Conditional on support holding.

NAIL.notes: If bonds rally (TLT 93.30+), NAIL should follow. Support 62 = entry point.

TLT.notes: Bond market reaction to Fed = key indicator. TLT move likely. Watch for relief rally post-dovish cut.

PLTR.notes: Government/AI narratives. Wait for directional clarity.

COST.notes: Consumer staple, but Andy caution on consumer ('tapped'). Quality hold but limited upside.

RBLX.notes: Lawsuit concerns about child abuse. Regulatory risk. Andy flagging for awareness.

SRUUF.notes: Alternative to CCJ/UEC for pure commodity exposure. Nuclear theme play.

ASTS.key_pattern: Drop 100 to 65 looks motive. If true, needs new low.
ASTS.notes: Technical analysis suggests further weakness if motive move. But could rally to 110-120 if structure clarifies positive. Wait for clarity before entry.

BE.notes: Clean energy, but underperforming NEE. Andy: 'Did not react like NEE.' Market preferring nuclear to solar. Range monitoring.

NEE.notes: NEE leading clean energy rally. Electric demand narrative strong. Outperforming BE.

TSM.key_pattern: If 302 holds, higher in intermediate timeframe
TSM.notes: INTRADAY ADD: Semis rally on rate cut (lower rates = growth acceleration). TSM testing 302 resistance. If holds, continuation expected per Andy.

RKT.key_pattern: Range breakout on Fed rate cut
RKT.notes: INTRADAY ADD: Mortgage rates down on Fed cut. RKT breakout setup 16-24 range per Andy.

GDXJ.key_pattern: Gap reaction critical - if through 96, targets 100
GDXJ.notes: INTRADAY UPDATE: Mining strength continues. GDXJ at 95-96 gap. Andy: 'Nothing until 100' if breakout. Critical level for gap reaction confirmation.

TLT.key_pattern: Dovish FOMC usually rallies bonds, but TLT down. Growth repricing stronger.
TLT.notes: INTRADAY UPDATE: TLT dropped despite dovish cut. Suggests growth repricing story + Fed QT ending (no more runoff) changes bond dynamics. Unexpected but indicates market risk appetite strong.

notes: This file is a quick reference during trading. When analyzing potential entries, check relevant ticker sections. If Andy's recent levels/bias align with your thesis = stronger confluence (Rule #0). Track whether Andy-aligned trades win more often than non-Andy trades.

update_protocol.process: Update andy_intel_tracking.json first. Then sync relevant tickers to this file.
update_protocol.expiration: Each ticker expires 7 days from last update. Expired tickers marked for refresh.
update_protocol.auto_cleanup: EOD each Friday: Archive tickers >7 days old to historical file
